mapper.select: SELECT COMT_SEQ as "seq", BOARD_SEQ as "boardSeq", COMT_USERNAME as "username", COMT_PWD as "password", COMT_CONTENTS as "contents", COMT_DATE as "date", PARENT_COMT as "parentComt" FROM ${TB} WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq} ORDER BY CONCAT(IF(PARENT_COMT is null, COALESCE(PARENT_COMT, ''), CONCAT('_', LPAD(PARENT_COMT,6,'0')) ), '_',LPAD(COMT_SEQ,6,'0')) LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPgLine}

SELECT COMT_SEQ as "seq", BOARD_SEQ as "boardSeq", COMT_USERNAME as "username", COMT_PWD as "password", COMT_CONTENTS as "contents", COMT_DATE as "DATE", PARENT_COMT as "parentComt" FROM ${TB} WHERE COMT_SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT ${TB} ( BOARD_SEQ, COMT_USERNAME, COMT_PWD, COMT_CONTENTS, COMT_DATE, PARENT_COMT ) VALUES ( #{comt.boardSeq}, #{comt.username}, #{comt.password}, #{comt.contents}, #{comt.date}, #{comt.parentComt} )
